## GAD-7 vs IRI

GAD-7 vs IRI In the field of psychology research, the comparison of different assessment instruments is key to cross-study analysis. One such comparison is between the Generalised Anxiety Disorder Assessment (GAD-7) and the Interpersonal Reactivity Index (IRI), widely known as GAD-7 vs IRI. The harmonisation of these tools is crucial in order to compare and evaluate studies accurately, yet this is often a laborious and subjective task. To streamline the process, using software like Harmony that leverages Natural Language Processing (NLP) and AI models can facilitate the comparison of GAD-7 vs IRI. Harmony provides researchers with an efficient and comprehensive matching between various instruments. Considering the comparison between GAD-7 vs IRI, Harmony uses advanced language models to measure the percentage match for each item from both assessment tools. This allows researchers to focus more on data analysis than on the tedious task of pairing items manually. Harmony can even handle harmonisation across multiple languages, taking the tool a notch higher for multi-cultural studies. Researchers can conveniently select instruments from Harmony's extensive database, or simply upload their own instruments in PDF form. With the web interface, researchers can easily compare GAD-7 and IRI or any other combinations, giving them the flexibility to conduct cross-study comparisons effortlessly. Harmony not only decreases the time spent on harmonisation, but also increases the accuracy and objectivity of the process, making it an indispensable tool for psychologists and social scientists in their research work.

## Compare the items in GAD-7 English and IRI

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import GAD-7 and IRI into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAD-7 into Harmony</a> - compare GAD-7 English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just IRI into Harmony</a> - compare IRI with other instruments


## Questions in GAD-7

|   No. | GAD-7 English                                                                                                                                      |
|------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge                                                                                                               |
|     2 | Not being able to stop or control worrying                                                                                                         |
|     3 | Worrying too much about different things                                                                                                           |
|     4 | Trouble relaxing                                                                                                                                   |
|     5 | Being so restless that it is hard to sit still                                                                                                     |
|     6 | Becoming easily annoyed or irritable                                                                                                               |
|     7 | Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen                                                                                                 |
|     8 | If you checked any problems, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people? |
